item.title: Lights are flickering and not bright enough, 22nd October
item.description:
There are many lights that are need to be changed. I cannot add all numbers of them due to photo adding restrictions. Needs a replacement Block B Crayford town hall square DA14FH.

item.title: Manston Airfield Flyposter on post, 22nd October
item.description:
Yet another Manston Airfield Market Flyposter has appeared in our streets. Are you able to contact them and issue a fine for littering our streets with their advertising junk? I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///handy.hugs.from https://w3w.co/handy.hugs.from

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Fairway, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branches hanging on pavement, 22nd October
item.description:
I reported this tree earlier in the year and was told that when inspected it was in good condition. The tree was lifted, Since then branches have fallen in the road and the park chaps picked them up, Today branches are hanging on the pavement. The tree is in poor condition and is cleaely dying. I tried to upload photos on my phone but they were going nowhere and I could not submit on my phone. The trunk is cracked and weak. The fruit is dying on the branches and the leaves were mostly dead in the spring. This tree is bent and I am concerned it is going to fall into my garden and onto my car. It is a crab apple tree fitting for an orchard not a public footpath
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garden Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light with no lamp, 22nd October
item.description:
Half way up Chartwell way, anerley. The street lamp has had no head on it for several weeks. It is the only light source when walking up Chartwell way at night. Needs to be fixed as it is necessary for safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Chartwell Way, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees need pruning in an official allotment, 22nd October
item.description:
Over the past years we have requested trees need the size reducing but in the past this has been refused. Now the height of the trees is significantly reducing the ability to cultivate the site near these trees and we are prepared to have them pruned at our own cost if the Council continue to refuse to do it, even though it is on Council land. We seek authorisation
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brindley Way, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding at pedestrian crossing, 22nd October
item.description:
Previously reported and closed by authority, this section of road consistently floods at the crossing when it rains. Likely a blocked drain. Flooding forces pedestrians to make unsafe crossings of a busy road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kennington Park Road, Elephant and Castle, London
